name: generate_circle_pattern
description: Generate points for a circle of a given radius and number of points. The pattern is centered on the arena midpoint by default.

num_points.description: The total number of points to generate on the circle's circumference. Defaults to 20.

center.description: Optional [x, y] coordinates for the circle's center. Defaults to the arena midpoint.

name: generate_rectangle_pattern
description: Generate points along the perimeter of a rectangle. The pattern is centered on the arena midpoint by default.

width_rect.description: The total width of the rectangle.

height_rect.description: The total height of the rectangle.

num_points.description: The number of points to generate on each side of the rectangle. Defaults to 10.

center.description: Optional [x, y] coordinates for the rectangle's center. Defaults to the arena midpoint.

name: generate_trapezium_pattern
description: Generate points around a symmetric trapezium. The pattern is centered on the arena midpoint by default.

top_width.description: The width of the top base of the trapezium.

bottom_width.description: The width of the bottom base of the trapezium.

num_points.description: The number of points to generate on each of the four sides. Defaults to 10.

center.description: Optional [x, y] coordinates for the trapezium's center. Defaults to the arena midpoint.

name: generate_parallelogram_pattern
description: Generate points around a parallelogram. The pattern is centered on the arena midpoint by default.

width_para.description: The length of the base of the parallelogram.

angle.description: The shear angle in radians. Defaults to pi/6.

num_points.description: The number of points to generate on each side. Defaults to 10.

center.description: Optional [x, y] coordinates for the parallelogram's center. Defaults to the arena midpoint.

name: generate_diamond_pattern
description: Generate points around a diamond (rhombus). The pattern is centered on the arena midpoint by default.

width.description: The total width of the diamond.

height.description: The total height of the diamond.

num_points.description: The number of points to generate on each of the four sides. Defaults to 10.

center.description: Optional [x, y] coordinates for the diamond's center. Defaults to the arena midpoint.

name: generate_lawnmower_pattern
description: Generate a back-and-forth lawnmower coverage pattern. The pattern is centered on the arena midpoint by default.

width_area.description: The width of the area to cover.

height_area.description: The height of the area to cover.

spacing.description: The spacing between each parallel pass. Defaults to 10.0.

center.description: Optional [x, y] coordinates for the center of the area. Defaults to the arena midpoint.

name: generate_zigzag_pattern
description: Generate a zigzag line pattern within a bounding box. The pattern is centered on the arena midpoint by default.

width_area.description: The width of the bounding box for the pattern.

height_area.description: The height of the bounding box for the pattern.

num_zigs.description: The number of individual 'zig' segments in the pattern. Defaults to 10.

center.description: Optional [x, y] coordinates for the center of the bounding box. Defaults to the arena midpoint.

name: generate_spiral_pattern
description: Generate an Archimedean spiral pattern. The pattern is centered on the arena midpoint by default.

turns.description: The total number of full rotations in the spiral. Defaults to 3.0.

max_radius.description: The maximum radius the spiral will reach. Defaults to 100.0.

num_points.description: The total number of points to generate along the entire spiral path. Defaults to 200.

center.description: Optional [x, y] coordinates for the spiral's center. Defaults to the arena midpoint.

name: generate_ellipse_pattern
description: Generate points for an ellipse. The pattern is centered on the arena midpoint by default.

major_axis.description: The length of the ellipse's major axis (radius).

minor_axis.description: The length of the ellipse's minor axis (radius).

num_points.description: The number of points to generate around the ellipse. Defaults to 50.

center.description: Optional [x, y] coordinates for the ellipse's center. Defaults to the arena midpoint.
